Hero.name: Aziz
Hero.description: I build scalable, high-performance web applications with a focus on clean architecture and user experience.

Approach.title: My Approach
Approach.subtitle: A precise engineering process for scalable results.

0.title: The Blueprint Phase
0.description: I don't guess‚ÄîI plan. Before writing a single line of code, I translate your ideas into a concrete technical specification.

1.title: Data Architecture
1.description: A robust application starts with the database. I visually design your database schema (ERD) upfront, defining relationships and data integrity rules.

2.title: Clean Implementation
2.description: I build systems, not just pages. Using strict TypeScript and modular architecture, I write code that is self-documenting and easy to extend.

3.title: Transparent Handover
3.description: You own everything. I deploy the project directly to your infrastructure and provide a clean Git repository with full commit history.

About.title: About
About.intro: I am a <highlight>{role}</highlight> focused on building scalable web applications and SaaS platforms. My primary expertise lies in the modern JavaScript ecosystem (<highlight>{stack}</highlight>) backed by solid database architecture.
About.philosophy: My development philosophy is grounded in thorough preparation. I prioritize detailed technical planning, architectural design, and clear specifications before implementation begins. This approach ensures predictable results, stability, and a scalable foundation for your project.

summaryText.p1: Business-Minded Full-Stack Engineer based in Seoul with 5+ years of experience in web development. I specialize in building scalable SaaS platforms and complex web applications using the modern JavaScript ecosystem (Next.js, TypeScript) backed by robust database architecture.
summaryText.p2: Uniquely positioned at the intersection of Engineering and Business Strategy. My background in International Business allows me to translate complex business requirements into technical blueprints that drive value. I follow an 'Architecture-First' philosophy: prioritizing detailed planning, data modeling, and clean system design to deliver assets that are secure, maintainable, and scalable.

contractor.title: Independent Contractor
points: Architecting and developing MVP and SaaS solutions for startups, focusing on scalability and clean code.
Conducting technical audits and providing architectural roadmaps ('Blueprints') for clients before development begins to minimize risks.
Key Achievement: Engineered EventLabs, a real-time event tracking platform handling high-volume webhooks with 99.9% uptime.

freelance.title: Freelance
points: Built a strong reputation through word-of-mouth referrals, delivering 20+ web solutions ranging from e-commerce platforms to internal CRM dashboards.
Managed the full software development lifecycle: from initial client consultation and deployment to support.
Migrated legacy PHP/Laravel applications to modern modular architectures, significantly improving performance and maintainability.

intern.title: Ministry of Economy of the Kyrgyz Republic
points: Assisted the IT department in maintaining internal network infrastructure and software systems.
Gained hands-on experience in enterprise-level IT operations and government sector data security protocols.
Collaborated with senior engineers to troubleshoot hardware and software issues for ministry staff.

eventlabs.title: EventLabs ‚Äî Real-Time Event Tracking SaaS
eventlabs.desc: Built a robust system for developers to track app events via webhooks. Implemented a reliable queue system for instant Discord notifications, ensuring data integrity during traffic spikes.

manga.title: Manga Reading Platform (High-Load Web App)
manga.desc: Engineered a content-heavy platform managing thousands of titles with Many-to-Many relationships. Optimized frontend caching strategies to achieve <100ms page load times, replicating top-tier industry performance.

education.degree: International Business & Trade (Concentration in CS/Software Engineering)
education.desc: Combined business studies with extensive self-directed coursework in Computer Science. Chosen path to bridge the gap between technical execution and business strategy.
